elements.title: Falnama (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that opening a Falnama on a painting of the queen of the fairies (example pictured) meant a prediction of good fortune?

elements.title: legally dead when they entered a religious order (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that under early English common law a person became legally dead when they entered a religious order?

elements.title: Kenya Grace (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Kenya Grace shot her first music video after becoming a finalist in a competition?

elements.title: wade-in (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that future Georgia representative Edna Jackson was part of a wade-in to protest segregation at Tybee Island Beach?

elements.title: Frank (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that student-aid startup Frank claimed to have 4.25 million users, but is alleged to have had fewer than 300,000?

elements.title: Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour caused the horror film The Exorcist: Believer to move its release date one week earlier from Friday, October 13, 2023?

elements.title: Rebecca Struthers (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Rebecca Struthers has a PhD in horology?

elements.title: sugar cubes (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that sugar cubes were used to deliver the polio vaccine?
